website_summaries.verdict: Responsive, simple to use, and effective. Offers the qualities consumers need in a medical alert system.
pros: Fee-free system with a 600-foot range and water-resistant pendant
Programmable for up to four contact numbers
cons: Pendant battery life tends to be short, and voice activation response is sometimes slow

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my parents years ago. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my parents years ago. I never wrote a review since it had never been needed until yesterday. My mom (92) slipped and fell flat on her face. The alert button was in her pocket and she immediately pushed the button to alert my sister who was nearby. She spent the night in the hospital while they ran tests and held her for observation. She was discharged today with an impressive shiner. Without the logicmark alert system she would have laid on the floor for hours until my sister returned from work. It worked perfectly and I am so proud of Mom for keeping it on her person all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen C.

customer_reviews.title: We would like either our money back or a pendant that lasts ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this company is now out of business. Bought this for my parents 45 days ago and it now no longer works. I have left probably 5 voicemails over the last week, with no return call from customer service. I've tried multiple numbers, etc. We would like either our money back or a pendant that lasts more than 1 1/2 months. Oh yes...... and their voicemail states they aren't open on weekends. People don't need support on weekends for an "EMERGENCY ALERT SYSTEM". ?? Next stop better business bureau. I've never left a bad review in my life, but felt it necessary here given the nature of the product and probably the worst customer service ever!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lane

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and works with Ooma VolP system. We don't have it set to call 911, just family members. (She was afraid to use it if it might call 911.) We have Mom use it daily to call us so she is familiar with it and comfortable using it. We remind her to push the button on the back to end the call. There's no volume control but it's loud enough. It's easier for her (age 88) to just push a button and talk to us than to use the phone.
customer_reviews.author: PetiteBuckeye

customer_reviews.title: Gave us peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for a older person that lives alone and it works great. I installed the phone numbers in order and I have the person check it once a month to make sure everything works and also so if there is an incident they are familiar with the functions. I was going to go with a subscription based system, done research and decided on this because of cost and this offers almost the same protection - works with a base station and has a 600' radius which is more than enough for her. All the other times she is in a car or with other people so this really helped us out.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Dennison

customer_reviews.title: Logic Mark Freedom Alert Emergency System, the best
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely exactly as described, only so much more satisfying than you can imagine. It is easy to operate, and very reliable. It came on time with prime, and I love it. This is my second one. I purchased this model years ago, and update just to stay current.. It gives my children such satisfaction knowing that I have the on me at all times. Even when I am out in the back yard. No monthly fee, and you can answer your phone from the pendant. Read about it and buy it, such a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Country Girl in Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Elderly Safety Net - Plus Critical Notes About this Unit's Batteries
customer_reviews.text: I researched many systems where you don't have to pay a monthly fee. A couple of critical notes on this unit. The rechargeable batteries with the unit were OLD (per serial number) and DOA so I had to buy new batteries. Luckily I called the manufacturer and they warned me not to buy generic batteries as they will melt the unit. You have to buy exact manufacturer replacements and there are several sources. No need to buy from them but they must be exact. The unit works great and saved my Mom (91) from a fall where she needed help. 4 Stars due to DOA Batteries
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 91 year old mother-in-law who lives alone at home. We loved this little unit. Last night it called the first contact to inform that the unit was not working correctly. Went over today, changed the batteries but that didn't fix the problem so was called the manufacturer. The determined that the pendant needs replacement and seeing that I purchased through Amazon They cannot help with the 12 month warranty on the unit. In the end, I wish this would have worked a little longer than 2 months past the warranty. I may need to purchase a replacement but if I do will order directly from them
customer_reviews.author: Bob G.

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind with efficient device.
customer_reviews.text: I am replacing an older version. I like that there are no monthly fees. I like that it dials 911 directly without going through a third party first. Help could be on the way faster with a direct connection to the 911 operator. If you prefer to talk to neighbor, friend or family first, there is a setting that will dial up to three numbers before dialing 911 if no one answers.
customer_reviews.author: DBell

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed product, and it works exactly as advertised. It was easy to set up even programming in your friends/family phone numbers. I previously had Medical Alert System that was connected to a call center, and I paid around around $38.00/month for the service. I tested this system by calling 911 & it works faster because it is direct & you don’t go through a third party. I have had only for a short period, but so far I am impressed. The up front cost sure beats the monthly fee.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Shreve

customer_reviews.title: No monthly service fee, works perfectly, great tech support!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike others, fob is water resistant! Can program to call 911 or several people, or both. Ours calls my cell 1st, then if I don't answer, calls 911. I misunderstood the directions (My bad - directions are clear) and needed tech support. Wow! Connected to someone quickly who patiently walked me thru it! I could not be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: W.P.

customer_reviews.title: I've Fallen & Can't Get UP!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I purchased this because I require home care assistance. It works through the telephone system and a no brainer to hook up. You can program JUST friends and family or a combination of friends and family and 911. The pendant is a two way speaker. The sound quality is great. Highly recommend this thing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ida A.

customer_reviews.title: good for someone that doesn't want a monitored umit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for someone that we wanted to have added protection for. This does a very good job. We have had it for several months and knowing you can direct who it calls, have it call 911 by-passing call list or that it allows to person called to have the unit call 911 if you think it is necessary are great features.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: I am 75 years old and work outside a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 75 years old and work outside a lot. Recently, my husband passed away and I felt afraid that I would get hurt outside and he is not here to check on me, so this was just the thing I needed. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love that this has the option to program 4 separate ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 90 year old mother who was having trouble remembering how to use the cordless phone. I wanted something simple, and I didn't want to have to go through a call center every time there was trouble. I love that this has the option to program 4 separate numbers in, as well as 911, so we can handle whatever problems come up. It was fairly simple to set up and we're quite happy with it. It is light weight, so she doesn't really notice she's even wearing it around her neck.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Simple to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: We wanted an alert system that wasn't tied to a monthly monitoring system. We are very happy with the LogicMark Freedom Alert system. The rechargeable batteries last a long time in standby (3 weeks or more) and the spare is always charged in the base unit, so there are no worries about swapping out batteries for continuous functionality. The set up was very straightforward, and the unit performs well, both dialing out and acting as a capable phone extension when the alert button is pushed. A great alternative to the high cost of monthly monitoring systems.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about a month. Now Remote does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Viking

customer_reviews.title: Works well for contacting family
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my 81 year old mother to get in contact with us. We have it set to just call us (house and cell phones) but not 911. It will keep calling those 4 numbers until one of us answers and presses 5. She can talk to us through the pendant which is better for this than the lifeline button she has where you have to be within hearing/speaking distance of the base unit to talk to the service's assistance personnel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: When my elderly Mother-in-Law fell she had no way of contacting someone to assist her. We bought both this product for her. The device that goes around her neck is light weight and easy for her to use. Just push the button to call for help. She feels safer now since she knows she can reach out for help when family is not close by.
customer_reviews.author: c.m. (grandma)

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. Sound quality for the person getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Sound quality for the person getting the help call is crystal clear. My Mom loves the piece of mind We paired with a wall communicator for extra fall coverage right outside of the shower. Does a test and announces battery power.
customer_reviews.author: BWW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for anyone caring for a loved one! The optional 911 is a perk (we prefer not to have it call 911 but know we can change that at any time). The pendant provides clear sound and I can hear my husband clearly when he calls me from it. He's been using it for 2 months now and only had one "accidental" button push, so that's not an issue. System rotates through all of the entered numbers without fail. Great product! Provides peace of mind!
customer_reviews.author: M.T.

customer_reviews.title: Long delay before announcement.
customer_reviews.text: Range is excellent. At least 150 ft range and probably closer to 200. Some reviews mentioned recording started too soon and was cut off. I had the opposite problem, a 3-4 sec delay similar to some robo calls. That's OK, just be sure everyone on the list knows this and doesn't hang up too soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Doing the Job
customer_reviews.text: This unit is doing what we wanted it to do for my 91 year old mother. One issue...The actual unit is rather cumbersome to wear. But she still likes it. And the family likes the idea of no monthly payment.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little system
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little system. Works perfectly and couldn't be any easier to setup. Took me all of about 2 minutes to setup. Tested and it worked perfect from inside and outside of the house. I went home today thinking this has been one of my better purchases in my lifetime. Couldn't be more pleased. Mom loves it and feels good having it. Also, ordered my system on a Friday -> got it on Monday and that wasn't even prime! Do it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Security For A Senior Friend
customer_reviews.text: My friend is 85 years old and is in quite good health; however, she has taken a couple of spills in her home. Thankfully they were not serious. As she lives alone she needed a way to call for help if she couldn't get to the telephone. Our neighbors check with her frequently and her children are wonderful in their caring for her. With this device she now knows that if she needs help she can get it with just the push of a button. As her friend it makes me very happy and her children are very pleased that their mother now has this assistant.
customer_reviews.author: BettyGee

customer_reviews.title: FreedomAlert with 600-Foot Range
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived exactly as described. Not a difficult set up. Can't speak to the range at this point. My siblings considered this a good alternative to paying monthy payments. I highly recommend visiting [...]. Great insight on choosing and using medical alert systems. If you don't want to visit this site, I'll pass along one of it's first tips: "Involve the person you are buying the system for in the decision making process." The point being, that if they are not going to use it (or use it correctly), there isn't much sense in buying it, and they are more likely to use it if they helped in the process. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: J Notter

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for an emergency alert system
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for an emergency alert system. Also the best price I could find. Very easy to set up and use. The only downside is that it only works at home, but I am not sure that the pay-for-service types work that well either. Usually when not at home there are people around to dial 911 for anyone. So I this item 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McMichael

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: We have had one of these for over a year. Seems to work fine. We like the fact it takes advantage of our 911 service to avoid unnecessary monthly charges. Battery life seem to be very good. Fortunately we have never had to use it, but I have made (pre-arranged) test calls to 911 and it seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: John B West

customer_reviews.title: very simple to set up and use, no monthly ...
customer_reviews.text: very simple to set up and use, no monthly plan....syncs up to the home phone line. helps ease our worry when we can't be home for the family member who is prone to falling. 4 stars because it is not actually water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: jek in the box

customer_reviews.title: ... don't have to pay a monthly fee for it like those I see advertised and I like that feature
customer_reviews.text: I don't have to pay a monthly fee for it like those I see advertised and I like that feature. However some of the ones I see advertised, maybe all of them, claim to be able to call for help even if you are away from home whereas this one needs to be within some 600 feet of the base unit which is connected to my home phone line. However I am usually where I can be seen if I am not at home so this factor is not a major one at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Feel much safer with backup support beside my bed or on my belt
customer_reviews.text: After I had a bleeding incident a couple of months ago and became helplessly weak. Fortunately I had a daughter near and available to take me to the ER. I realized if she had been out of town. I would havery been in trouble, I had trouble calling help. I have the emergency caller in place beside my bed since it arrived. It can dial up to five of my family for help with a push of a button. If no help available it will call 911 for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M

customer_reviews.title: The biggest issue with this device is that the time ...
customer_reviews.text: The biggest issue with this device is that the time between enter the number 5 for communicating with the person is too short for the receive and even if the receive of the call press 5 to talk to the caller, after the call, the system still dials the next person. This is absolutely a deal breaker for me. I didn't have time to fully test this and now I can't return the product.
customer_reviews.author: ljtxoov

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to a paying a monitoring service. Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great system. Works all over my mother's house and outside property. The only thing is that the wristband option doesn't hold the module in very well and she's dropped it twice already (in 1 week of use). We found it, but at $75 for replacement, it's not the best option. The belt clip and lanyard seem to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised with how easy this was to install and setup. The unit pretty much tells you what to do. Also like the switch which allows different modes of operation.
customer_reviews.author: Eldonsdad

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. Batteries provided hold charges
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Batteries provided hold charges. Have it set on friend only mode. Mother has contacted me with no difficulty. Like speaking on a cell phone
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: solves access problems for elderly parents
customer_reviews.text: Parents are elderly with mobility problems in their home. They get along fine,but a phone system that can call from a few hundred feet keeps all of us more comfortable knowing help is readily available.Set up is fast and easy. Phone is very small and there are several holders that make carrying it very comfortable.My parents aren't tech types and they don't have any problem with it. If it was used one time,it would be priceless in that situation.
customer_reviews.author: TIM E GERBER

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This it the best present i ever got Dad. I dont have to worry he is having problems at home. he can call me for small issues not just 911 like the services do. In 10 months it will have paid for itself. He can go outside and walk too and still call me..it tells you if you are going out of range. He can answer the phone if he is sitting somewhere not near the phone. If you decide to get one use me as a reference and i get money back too. April hawkins of iowa
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to setup. The trial run worked perfectly. I especially liked that you can speak through the pendant. The speaker is very clear. Also the distance covered from the base is great. This was purchased for my mother who is 89 years old and still enjoys working in her yard. This gives her a chance to enjoy her gardening and still be able to access help if needed. Another plus is a one time cost.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for my mom, after looking at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mom, after looking at the paid services. This dialer will provide the same emergency assistance, without the monthly fees...and eliminating the middle man of those services. It dials your choice of contacts or emergency numbers. Not sure of the full range capability, but it worked well at the 100 ft. range we tested outside her house. It has a very clear and loud volume, also. I think anyone, of any age, living by themselves would find this to be a very valuable safeguard to have.
customer_reviews.author: VCURams

customer_reviews.title: Ten Stars PLUS!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product 10 stars, I would do it! The pendant is small enough that my mom can wear it without even noticing, and the option of programming in up to 4 numbers is better than we could hope for. Simple, ABSOLUTELY EASY, instructions for set-up, and the system is portable and easily reprogrammable if she goes to stay with my sister for an extended stay. LOVE IT, and the price is less than any subscription service out there.
customer_reviews.author: Coleen V

customer_reviews.title: Setup is easy but you have to read the instructions carefully
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with this unit. The pendant is small and light. You just hold the button and it starts the calling system. Setup is easy but you have to read the instructions carefully. Supposedly the battery lasts for 3-4 months so I'm hoping to achieve that.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my ailing but stubborn great grandma. It's small, easy to use and set up and doesn't sent a fleet of firemen and medics through her front door. Went for this item specifically because she doesn't like to think she needs real help, just needed a way to alert her select few people in case of an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I think this is the best option for people who need this service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my terminally ill father when he could still get around. I think this is the best option for people who need this service.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: ... it out a couple times and it worked just like is supposed too
customer_reviews.text: Have not needed it yet for emergency but did try it out a couple times and it worked just like is supposed too. It gives me pease of mine when I have to leave my wife knowing that she can push button and will get me, my son, my daughter or it will dial 911. Great item for the individual that is handicapped.
customer_reviews.author: Francis R. Bresett

customer_reviews.title: This system is wonderful. I had to leave my husband alone for ...
customer_reviews.text: This system is wonderful. I had to leave my husband alone for 4 days and was looking for an alert pendant he could wear. Very simple to program. He liked the fact that he could choose between wearing around his neck, on his wrist, or clip on his clothes or belt. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Freedom Alert personal alarm system
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my mom, haven't needed to use it yet. Hooked it up at my house to see how it worked, before taking it to her. It is extremely easy to set up and operate. I really like that you can decide and set the base to only call friends/family, but you can also add 911 or just set it to call 911. I thin this is a great value for the price. Received in within 3 days of ordering and the item was exactly as was described.
customer_reviews.author: casey's mom

customer_reviews.title: Works. Remote is large though but for the money a good value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for mom in law. Works and she likes it. The remote is large but she puts it n her pocket or ties it around her waist with a ribbon. Wish it offered a remote that was necklace sized.
customer_reviews.author: kidsrmylife

customer_reviews.title: good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: easy set up -- works well in tests. portable phone extension is bonus
customer_reviews.author: George McDuffee

customer_reviews.title: Does what we want it to do  - But
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars.. but. One of the batteries didn't work and I couldn't contact anyone to ask about it, or get it replaced, so we ordered (at our expense) the extra battery.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertized
customer_reviews.text: This product works fine right out of the box. The instructions are easily understood and programming in the phone numbers to be called before 911 is not difficult--though I wouldn't expect an elderly person to do it on her own. The home base verifies every step with a voice response, including a battery check at the end of each use. Battery backup for coverage during power outages is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Cross

customer_reviews.title: A Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Freedom Alert for my 93 year old mother who lives alone next door. I love the fact that she can notify family first. I don't think she would use it if only 911 was called. This product gives me as well my mother "Peace of Mind" every day. The only problem we have had is because my mother is leagley blind, it is hard for her to know if she is pushing the Panic button (blue)or the Test button (gray). It's a good buy with no monthly fees.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: It was a lifesaver and set up just like it said, very easy. The fact that you purchase rather than "rent" it is super, plus there is no middle man. The option of the lock box to prevent the need to break your door was genius!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this device!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly father who has fallen several times. We had previously tried Great Call but could never get it to activate due to the service in the rural area where he lives. This device works through a land line and when activated, calls me and then a list of people until someone answers. If no one answers it calls 911. The device is waterproof and comes with rechargeable batteries that you rotate into the base to charge weekly. It has worked extremely well and highly recommend it, plus no monthly fees are incurred to a service to answer the calls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FreedomAlert, a must for those with health-medical issues!
customer_reviews.text: To start, the price is great (a one time pay) compared to the monthly charge of other units. Next, the option of calling others instead of 911 directly. Next, the unit does work going through the numbers in memory before the 911. This will save a lot of unnecessary 911 calls when one of the memory numbers will call a friend or care-taker to help the wearer of the unit in minor situations.
customer_reviews.author: Sally C.

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy feeling more secure.
customer_reviews.text: 'My eighteen-yer-old grandson set it up for me and it seems to deliver all it claims to do. I hope I will never really have to test it, but I know I will feel more comfortable when I am alone. Everything looks to be high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Freedom Alert
customer_reviews.text: This device works well and does not entail a monthly service fee to use the service. This ist he second one that I bought; one for my in-laws and one for my Mom giving us all 'piece of mind'. The device allows the unit to call a list of friends or 911 or both.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl C.

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product which is very easy to program. It works well and hopefully will never have to be used. The concept is very easy for the elderly to comprehend. It was purchased for my 93 year old mother to use in Florida for the winter. She will also be able to use it when she returns to Canada .
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Hound

customer_reviews.title: Economical, convenient, effective
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. More economical & convenient that subscribing to a service. Working out very well for our family. Simple to set up and operate. My MIL does not have her eyesight and this is very convenient for her.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Jenson

customer_reviews.title: Product is exceptional
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. It is every thing that I wanted to help me at home. I have Spinal Stenosis and very bad balance and was afraid of falling during the night or day. My daughter is usually around during the day as she lives close by but it was at night that I was worried if I had to get up during the night. I feel so much better now, knowing that I can contact her or 911 during an emergency. I will let my friends know about this product as I am very, very pleased with the way it works and the ease of setting it up. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: It's seldom, if ever, I write product reviews except in cases where the product has completely exceed my expectations and this one certainly has. The product is very well thought out and well designed. It was easy to set up and worked everywhere in my house and as far away as my mailbox (about 150 feet from the house). The sound was very clear at both ends and loud enough for a person with a hearing loss. In my opinion this is the best device of this type on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Works for my grandma
customer_reviews.text: So I just got it and it wasn’t that hard to set up the numbers. My grandma likes that you can choose if you want to have it call 911 or just family. We tried it out and my voice came through pretty clear. I’ve only had it for a day, but overall it was worth it for the peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Lambert

customer_reviews.title: The portable device is a bit bulky, but it does work
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. The portable device is a bit bulky, but it does work. Simple to program.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Excellent uunit
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for long time for my old mother for in case of emergency can call me or call 911. Eventually I found this unit, which is a great unit. It is very easy to setup. Also I found with great technical support, also I give FIVE STAR to the technical support. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Piran Mohazzabi

customer_reviews.title: Received F6, ordered F7.  Works, and happy with price!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged, and was easily installed. Can not rate performance as there has been no need yet, but all tests are AOK. I dropped rating one star because the model I got was F6 instead of F7.
customer_reviews.author: Homer K.

customer_reviews.title: Timely delivery and good price.
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered a day earlier than expected and it seems to have the features and capabilities that my mother-in-law was looking for. Unit appears to be identical to that sold under a couple of other brand names, but price was good.
customer_reviews.author: M. Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to help my mother keep her independence. So easy to set up, works great. Unbelievable range, at least in her area, the workable range was double. She can use it even when visiting neighbors. And best of all no monitoring fee's.
customer_reviews.author: lovescuba

customer_reviews.title: Reccomended
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother. It was easy to setup with clear and easy to follow instructions. It worked as described.
customer_reviews.author: MGW

customer_reviews.title: Great help
customer_reviews.text: We didn't want a monthly service fee tied into a medic alert product and we were'nt sure what to buy. After reading reviews we chose this one and are pleased with how it works and the ease of set up. My father-in-law is deaf and this product is much better for him because it will contact friends or family who know once they've been contacted there is a problem. I like that is like a phone, so we can hear him telling us the problem and even though because of his deafness he can't hear us he knows help will soon arrive.
customer_reviews.author: carolee turner

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. My grandmother can even go to the mailbox across the street and it still works. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: VERY RELIABLE BUT LIMITED RANGE
customer_reviews.text: The Freedom Alert is all it says it is including FREE. I like the way it contacts upto 4 Friends and if no one answers it will automatically contact the next on the list. East to set up and the batteries last very long. The range is somewhat limited but again I have a large area to cover at home. I reccommend it for the price and I also purchased the shower unit and works well though I would like to see it water proof versus water resistant and the same goes with the pendant.
customer_reviews.author: A. Capo

customer_reviews.title: this is absolutely the best! no monthly charges
customer_reviews.text: this is absolutely the best! no monthly charges, very easy to set up, very light to wear... my 82 yo mother forgets she has it on. She had fallen in her garage and was trapped on the floor bw wall and car. Now we have no more worries for her. Well worth the money. Should be a birthday or Christmas gift to any loved one elderly, or home alone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Haq

customer_reviews.title: Good Value.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a system that was short-circuited by lightning. Just as good as the original!
customer_reviews.author: Joni Wolf

customer_reviews.title: LogicMark FreedomAlert
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a system that would work for my mother, Who did not think she needed one. When I found this system (LogicMark FreedomAlert) I thought I would try It. It works just the way they said it would. I program it the first time though with little to no trouble. I liked that the unit will call the numbers you want first, then 911. My mother love it because it us first. thanks a lot. Rick
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect! It gives us confidence our 82 year old mother can get help if/when she needs it. It works just as advertised. It calls the programmed numbers in order. When the call is picked up, the systems tells the person to press 5 to continue. Otherwise the system will think an answering machine picked up. If a 5 is not pushed the system will call the next programmed number. We are very pleased with this system.
customer_reviews.author: S Hooten

customer_reviews.title: Vendor provides product as they advertise
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered as advertised. It looks like new and it works great. My mother-in-law has already used it successfully severl times for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Joan B.

customer_reviews.title: Freedom Alert
customer_reviews.text: Oh My Gosh, I would highly recommend this product for any family. My brother, sisters, and I have done alot of research for different types of intercoms/911 alert systems for our parents. What's nice with this alert system, you have the initial cost only. Very easy to set up. We have peace of mind knowing our parents can get help when they need it. And, they are not restricted to the house. The 600 ft range from the base unit is great. Thank you very much for offering this product!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for. I wanted a system to call me or friends when my husband had a problem. It was easy for him to understand and use. The fact that he could talk right through the device was perfect. I just plugged the unit into a phone jack and then programmed the unit to dial my cell phone and other family members. Plus, there is no ongoing fee to pay. I have no complaints about anything. It is perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: I was really impressed by this system . Works very well . Pretty simple
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed by this system . Works very well . Pretty simple . One thing I don't like is that you lose the numbers you input if you want to change just one number ;-/ Also it's tricky putting numbers in because you have to do them all in a row without stopping . I did it on the first try though .Just have every number in front of you when you go to put them in . The performance like the area that the device reaches is very good . The sound seems clear . Showed it to several people and they were all impressed by the device .
customer_reviews.author: mirlen101

customer_reviews.title: I have recommended it to many
customer_reviews.text: This device works fabulously and has quickly paid for itself in savings over what other companies charge monthly for monitoring fees. It gives Mom peace of mind when she's alone in the house and it gives me peace of mind that Mom is never really alone! I have recommended it to many!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Summerville

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to program, you better have a tech geek around, and if you have to make any changes you have to start the whole process over. Battery went dead in the handheld part and mom didn't know what was happening, It would call the first person on list and announce some wierd message and they never knew what was going on. It took several weeks for someone to figure out the battery was dead and then changing it did not solve problem. Ended up disconnecting it and have it for sale on craigslist now.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: So far works like a charm.....
customer_reviews.text: Have had this in place for a month - so far so good. Had a bit of difficulty with it to begin with. The pendent\system called the first person on the call list early the 1st morning with a cryptic message we could not decypher. Called Freedom Alert Customer Service - turns out the system thought there were 2 pendants (no idea why) and they walked me thru deleting all & getting the correct one (and only one) setup. Even programed all the call numbers for me !! Great Customer Service so far.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Quit Working After 3 Months
customer_reviews.text: After three months use, the item quit working. We contacted LogicMark and they said it had to be returned to Amazon. Now the return period has passed. I'd like to be contacted by Amazon, the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W.

customer_reviews.title: Exellent product
customer_reviews.text: Freedom Alert - Freedomalert DECT II with Extra Pendant works much better then expected. Im not one to rave about a product but this system has performed like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Meeting our expectations!
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law has been wearing it since we got it. It tested well and was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: Emergency alert system
customer_reviews.text: great to have this kind of product without the monthly fees.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal T.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great when my Mom fell & I was at work.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Jade

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to set up and program both pendants
customer_reviews.text: It is everything we expected and need. It was easy to set up and program both pendants. I like that there is no monthly fees involved and yet we still have the security of being safe and being able to get help if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Worth the cost for peace of mind when an elderly person is alone in their home.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Arena

customer_reviews.title: Very good unit
customer_reviews.text: This works great. If you do not need one that is monorted by a third party then I would highly recomend this unit. The only draw back that I have found is it is not water proof so can not be worn in the shower. The way around that is to put it in a baggie or freezer bag and set it on the floor next to the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great concept and execution
customer_reviews.text: Simple, clear design and a very smart approach to keeping elders in touch with help from family and friends. Some of the tabs on the device could be a little more accessible and easy to select, but that's a small detail. The user guide could be a little more clearly presented. But overall, very, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo Bill

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty impressed
customer_reviews.text: The Freedomalert does seem to work as was stated in the advertisements. It is easy to set up. The range is good for a modest-sized house or apartment, including working outside on the porch, patio, and close-by garden. Battery life of remote alert is very good, actually better than expected. It is very light weight and small enough to wear comfortably around the neck. The speaker is loud and clear enough for a real conversation. Overall, it seems like a very good value considering that you only pay for it once.
customer_reviews.author: Bock66

customer_reviews.title: Which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.text: So far, haven't had to use it! Which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Howland

customer_reviews.title: Waste of good money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 86 year old mother in November and it seemed to work fine. In February I started getting telephone messages that the rechargeable batteries were low and that the remote unit was out of range. I changed the batteries and still kept getting the same messages so I put the remote on top of the base unit and it still said the remote was out of range. Finally gave up. You would think that a unit that cost as much as this would last more than two months. Don't buy this piece of junk!!!
customer_reviews.author: John McC

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Mom, very easy to use and no monthly bill. The wall unit is also ideal for the bathroom as my Dad will not wear an alert and knows it is there should he fall. We all love the option of calling someone other than 911. This gives everyone peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy W

customer_reviews.title: Quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Quality item. Really easy to set up. Well written clear instructions. Perfect for mom at home.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered 5 days early. Was exactly as advertised. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Tried it out and had it go ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Tried it out and had it go through the list of numbers all the way to 911. They answered promptly!
customer_reviews.author: WinoWeaver

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product and not too hard to figure out...pretty basic in setting it up. Gives our family peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Robee12

customer_reviews.title: Wet
customer_reviews.text: It works good but you can't get it wet so it useless when when taking a bath or shower.
customer_reviews.author: terry m graham

customer_reviews.title: This product is great! Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Easy installation. Works as well as the ADT unit and pays for itself in four months. Necklace unit is larger than the ADT unit but can be used as a phone.
customer_reviews.author: HBRPh

customer_reviews.title: Freedom alert
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Easy to set up. Check out was easy. I would recommend this to people that want to get ahold of someone and not have to call 911. Gave me peace of mind that I can leave my mother alone for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

product_meta.title: LogicMark Freedom Alert Emergency System
product_meta.description: The LogicMark freedom alert emergency pendant communicator allows instant 2-way speaker phone communication through your mini wearable pendant to family, friends, or neighbors - anytime from anywhere - in or around the home. If your programmed contacts are unreachable at the moment, the system can default to contact a 911 emergency operator. Fully portable for use in homes with land lines. Includes lanyard, wrist/wheelchair strap holder. Also includes belt clip and 2 rechargeable batteries. Dimensions:11L x 2.5W x 10H inches.Features dial 5 feature and dial 911 feature , system test and battery test functions with audible prompts and confirmations during set-up and testing with combination of up to 4 pendants or Emergency Wall Communicators programmed to one base station and auto power off of pendant after one minute of inactivity
feature_bullets: 600 Foot Range (2 football fields) * Talk Through The Pendant Two-Way Voice
Answer Incoming Calls With The pendant
